item.title: beatrix
item.description: × BEATRIX HD Wallpaper ❮ ❯ BEATRIX MOBILE LEGENDS Role: Marksman Lane: Gold Lane Tier : A+ Tier BP : 32000 DM : 599 Ticket : 0 beatrix × @ Close More Info Hero skills Beatrix Skills 1 × Renner Close Beatrix Skills 2 × Mechanical Genius Her extraordinary talent in the field of mechanics allowed Beatrix to produce 4 weapon(s) of truly awe-inspiring firepower. @{E1058003|1|10510|(Renner) Basic Attack - Longshot: Fire a powerful shot in the enemy's current direction, dealing 125( +500% Total Physical ATK) (Physical Damage) to the first target hit (this shot can be dodged, or blocked by others.
